DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study verify effect stretch protocol pectoralis minor muscle rest length 3D kinematics scapula arm flexion asymptomatic subject patient impingement syndrome shorten pectoralis minor .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Pectoralis Minor Muscle Stretching Protocol
DOC.detailed_description: Fifty subject ( 25 symptomatic 25 asymptomatic shoulder pain ) recruit . All initially assess twice one week assessment . On day , complete two questionnaire ( DASH SPADI ) ass pain shoulder function . The rest length pectoralis minor muscle scapular kinematics data arm flexion also measure use electromagnetic tracking system . Initially , rest length pectoralis minor measure , 3 repetition arm elevation sagittal plane complete . The stretch protocol perform daily 6 week . The stretching perform subject standing , 90° arm abduction 90° elbow flexion palm flat planar surface . The subject place leg opposite flat surface front slight knee flexion tilt trunk forward like rigid block rotate slightly increase horizontal abduction shoulder . This procedure do 4 time 1 min 30 interval repetition . After 6 week , subject variable initial assessment reassess . For questionnaire length pectoralis minor two-way ANOVA repeat measure use check main effect group evaluation whether interaction . For scapular internal/external rotation , upward/downward rotation , tilt anterior/posterior three-way ANOVA repeat measure use analyze main effect group ( symptomatic asymptomatic ) , elevation angle arm ( 30° , 60° , 90° 120° ) evaluation ( 1 , 2 3 ) whether evaluation x group x angle interaction . A p value le 0.05 consider significant .
DOC.criteria: Asymptomatic subject include positive test SIS . The subject shoulder pain include : 1. history shoulder , least one week ; 2 . 18 45 year ; 3. range motion > 150° evaluated digital inclinometer ; 4. one impingement test positive Neer ( Neer , 1972 ) , Hawkins ( Hawkins Kennedy , 1980 ) Jobe ( Jobe Moynes , 1982 ) associate painful arc arm elevation , external rotation 90° arm elevation ; 5 . Individuals group also present shorten PM muscle length . Individuals group exclude : 1 . BMI ( body mass index ) > 28kg/m2 ; 2. irradiated shoulder pain ; 3. scoliosis ; 4. history shoulder pain begin traumatic ; 5. history fracture surgery upper limb rotator cuff ; 6. systemic illness ; 7. tape allergy ; 8. pregnant ; 9. physiotherapy least 6 month .
